english.segment1: Hold on tight cause jealousy hurts. we've come so far but remained the same
english.segment2: We need something new to love with cause our hearts are broken. We dont love like we should.
english.segment3: We try, and we've tried honey to take love and, make love pretty. The verdict is guilty honey we all love with bad intentions
english.segment4: let's not go back to what we regret. we never learned so i'll take blame
english.segment5: We need something new to love with cause our hearts are broken. why dont we love like we should.
english.segment6: we can feel the tension to get to close too one another. Oh, oh, oh. Cause i've been drinking poison and honey you've made the same mistake. Oh, oh, oh.
